--------------------------------------------------------
--  DDL for Table AA_LOG
--------------------------------------------------------

  CREATE TABLE "BASE_CL25_2"."AA_LOG" 
   (	"AA_LOG_ID" NUMBER(14,0), 
	"EVENT_TYPE" NUMBER(4,0), 
	"TIMESTAMP" TIMESTAMP (3) WITH TIME ZONE, 
	"COMPONENT" NVARCHAR2(2000), 
	"TITLE" NVARCHAR2(2000), 
	"MESSAGE" NCLOB, 
	"AA_STRATEGY_ID" NUMBER(14,0), 
	"AA_STRATEGY_ALTERNATIVE_ID" NUMBER(14,0), 
	"INTERVENTION_RESULT_SET_ID" NUMBER(14,0)
   ) SEGMENT CREATION IMMEDIATE 
  PCTFREE 10 PCTUSED 40 INITRANS 1 MAXTRANS 255 
 NOCOMPRESS LOGGING
  STORAGE(INITIAL 65536 NEXT 1048576 MINEXTENTS 1 MAXEXTENTS 2147483645
  PCTINCREASE 0 FREELISTS 1 FREELIST GROUPS 1
  BUFFER_POOL DEFAULT FLASH_CACHE DEFAULT CELL_FLASH_CACHE DEFAULT)
  TABLESPACE "ESPDATA" 
 LOB ("MESSAGE") STORE AS SECUREFILE (
  TABLESPACE "ESPDATA" ENABLE STORAGE IN ROW CHUNK 8192
  NOCACHE LOGGING  NOCOMPRESS  KEEP_DUPLICATES 
  STORAGE(INITIAL 106496 NEXT 1048576 MINEXTENTS 1 MAXEXTENTS 2147483645
  PCTINCREASE 0
  BUFFER_POOL DEFAULT FLASH_CACHE DEFAULT CELL_FLASH_CACHE DEFAULT)) ;

--  DDL for Table AA_STRATEGY
--------------------------------------------------------

  CREATE TABLE "BASE_CL25_2"."AA_STRATEGY" 
   (	"AA_STRATEGY_ID" NUMBER(14,0), 
	"CODE" NVARCHAR2(80), 
	"NAME" NVARCHAR2(100), 
	"ANALYSIS_BASE_FISCAL_YEAR" NUMBER(4,0), 
	"CALCULATION_HORIZON_YEARS" NUMBER(3,0), 
	"PRIORITIZATION_HORIZON_YEARS" NUMBER(3,0), 
	"CREATOR_ID" NUMBER(14,0), 
	"CREATED_DATE" TIMESTAMP (3) WITH TIME ZONE, 
	"UPDATER_ID" NUMBER(14,0), 
	"UPDATED_DATE" TIMESTAMP (3) WITH TIME ZONE, 
	"VERSION" NUMBER(9,0), 
	"DESCRIPTION" NVARCHAR2(2000), 
	"ASSET_SEARCH_SERIALIZED_XML" NCLOB, 
	"NAME_NLS" RAW(1610) GENERATED ALWAYS AS (NLSSORT("NAME",'nls_sort=''GENERIC_BASELETTER''')) VIRTUAL 
   ) SEGMENT CREATION IMMEDIATE 
  PCTFREE 10 PCTUSED 40 INITRANS 1 MAXTRANS 255 
 NOCOMPRESS LOGGING
  STORAGE(INITIAL 65536 NEXT 1048576 MINEXTENTS 1 MAXEXTENTS 2147483645
  PCTINCREASE 0 FREELISTS 1 FREELIST GROUPS 1
  BUFFER_POOL DEFAULT FLASH_CACHE DEFAULT CELL_FLASH_CACHE DEFAULT)
  TABLESPACE "ESPDATA" 
 LOB ("ASSET_SEARCH_SERIALIZED_XML") STORE AS SECUREFILE (
  TABLESPACE "ESPDATA" ENABLE STORAGE IN ROW CHUNK 8192
  NOCACHE LOGGING  NOCOMPRESS  KEEP_DUPLICATES 
  STORAGE(INITIAL 106496 NEXT 1048576 MINEXTENTS 1 MAXEXTENTS 2147483645
  PCTINCREASE 0
  BUFFER_POOL DEFAULT FLASH_CACHE DEFAULT CELL_FLASH_CACHE DEFAULT)) ;

   COMMENT ON COLUMN "BASE_CL25_2"."AA_STRATEGY"."CALCULATION_HORIZON_YEARS" IS 'The number of years to calculate optimal intervention dates over, starting from the analysis base fiscal year.';
   COMMENT ON COLUMN "BASE_CL25_2"."AA_STRATEGY"."PRIORITIZATION_HORIZON_YEARS" IS 'The number of years to prioritize interventions over, starting from the analysis base fiscal year.';
   COMMENT ON COLUMN "BASE_CL25_2"."AA_STRATEGY"."ASSET_SEARCH_SERIALIZED_XML" IS 'Search criteria for selecting assets to perform analytics on.';
   COMMENT ON COLUMN "BASE_CL25_2"."AA_STRATEGY"."NAME_NLS" IS 'Virtual column NLSSORT';

  TABLESPACE "ESPDATA" ;

Only one record may be set to ''true'' (i.e. <> 0) to indicate this is the default culture/language. There is no trigger/constraint enforcing a lone record is the default, but there will be at least one query in the business-logic that will ''throw'' if no record is found or more than one record is found.';

 NOCOMPRESS LOGGING

  TABLESPACE "ESPDATA" ;

   COMMENT ON COLUMN "BASE_CL25_2"."CUSTOM_FIELD_LIST_FILTER"."LIST_FILTER" IS 'If the custom field is a ''CustomFieldType.DropDownList'', then this column indicates a filter to be applied to the drop-down''s enumeration. For Account, Activity, Organization, and WBS, it specifies the TYPE_ID to be included in the enumeration; for User it specifies the Group_ID the users belong to; for DocumentRevision it specifies the DocumentFileType to filter on.';
   COMMENT ON TABLE "BASE_CL25_2"."CUSTOM_FIELD_LIST_FILTER"  IS 'For custom fields that are ''drop-down-list'' types (e.g. Account or Users), and where there is some filtering of the source table, allow selection from a subset by having one or more records in this table. For example, with an custom field of list-type Organization, the LIST_FILTER of this table will specify the Organization_TYPE_ID or organizations that should be included in any pick-list.';

   COMMENT ON COLUMN "BASE_CL25_2"."EXCHANGE_RATE_SET"."ASSOCIATION_DEFAULT_COUNT" IS 'Virtual column used to count the number of records in EXCHANGE_RATE_SET_RATE that reference this exchange rate set and have USE_DEFAULT set to true.    COMMENT ON COLUMN "BASE_CL25_2"."EXCHANGE_RATE_SET_RATE"."CURRENCY_UNIT2_ID" IS 'The other of the two currency-type units that forms the currency pair for an exchange rate. It is arbitrary whether it is the source or target currency, as unordered uniqueness is enforced on this.';

   COMMENT ON COLUMN "BASE_CL25_2"."EXPENDITURE_UPDATE_STATUS"."HAS_UNSUBMITTED_FORECAST_EDITS" IS 'When true, there is an unsubmitted draft forecast change which is NOT caused by changes to any of the following: inflation rate, spend template, outage occurrence definition, or resource pricing';
   COMMENT ON COLUMN "BASE_CL25_2"."EXPENDITURE_UPDATE_STATUS"."HAS_UNSUBMITTED_FCST_INFLATION" IS 'When true, the inflation rate has changed for a date that is after the expenditure''s last month of actuals and on or before the date of distribution items with spend amounts.';

   COMMENT ON COLUMN "BASE_CL25_2"."FORECAST"."UPPER_INTERP_ALTERNATIVE_ID" IS 'For the interpolated alternative, the higher of the two alternatives which will combined using the multipliers to calculate value';

 NOCOMPRESS LOGGING

   COMMENT ON TABLE "BASE_CL25_2"."MEASURE_FORMULA"  IS 'New Risk Benefit schema \
Individual formulas for various kinds of measures: inv cost, condition, risk, etc. \
Produces 2 time-varying streams: \
1) Unit stream: for constraints and display purposes \
2) Zynos stream: for Value Function calculations \
------- \
Stream calculations may require internal resource price time series to convert to base currency amount. \
If no prompt vars, UI will not offer user a way to edit the value measure directly. \
------- \
Output is unitless but implied by Consq_Unit_ID in Value_Measure table. \
Zynos output uses hard-coded constant for conversion or references a price/rate \
stream.';

Account. \
Default value used when adding a new prompt var to an existing formula. \
------- \
Similar, but simpler, than the Custom_Field_Attribute table.';

   COMMENT ON COLUMN "BASE_CL25_2"."MEASURE_REF_VAR"."MEASURE_OUTPUT_TYPE" IS 'Applies only if REF_MEASURE_ID is not null. The type of output to use from the referenced measure. The corresponding enumeration type is defined in CL.FormulaHelper.';
   COMMENT ON COLUMN "BASE_CL25_2"."MEASURE_REF_VAR"."ALWAYS_USE_BASELN_MEASR_OUTPUT" IS 'Applies only if REF_MEASURE_ID is not null. If False, the formula will use the Baseline measure output when calculating Baseline values, and the Impact measure output when calculating Impact Values. If True, the Baseline measure output is always used whether the formula is calculating baseline or impact values.';
   COMMENT ON COLUMN "BASE_CL25_2"."MEASURE_REF_VAR"."ASSOCIATED_ENTITY" IS 'The associated entity for this input type';
   COMMENT ON COLUMN "BASE_CL25_2"."MEASURE_REF_VAR"."CORE_FIELD_TYPE" IS 'The Core Field type (enumeration)';
   COMMENT ON COLUMN "BASE_CL25_2"."MEASURE_REF_VAR"."EXPECT_MULTIPLE_MEASR_SET_INST" IS 'Applies only if REF_MEASURE_ID is not null. If True, the formula will expect measure inputs to be received in a list to accomodate multiple entries. If False, only a single value will be expected.';
   COMMENT ON TABLE "BASE_CL25_2"."MEASURE_REF_VAR"  IS 'New Risk Benefit schema \
Prevents deletion of items referenced by questionnaires. \
Ref to Base/Impact Measure is for a dependent data stream reqd by formula. Examples: \
- Baseline Likelihood needs access to baseline CondScore. \
- Impact Conseq needs access to baseline Conseq.';

Questnr, Impact Questnr
---
Support for a single Impact over time horizon for AutoRisk
ConditionScore. To handle this, create 2
Questionnaires, 1 with single question re CondScore and
add flag indicating only 1 impact per time interval.';

--------------------------------------------------------
--  DDL for Table PARAMETER
--------------------------------------------------------

  CREATE TABLE "BASE_CL25_2"."PARAMETER" 
   (	"PARAMETER_ID" NUMBER(14,0), 
	"CODE" NVARCHAR2(80), 
	"VERSION" NUMBER(9,0), 
	"TYPE" NUMBER(9,0), 
	"IS_SKIPPED_BY_STARTUP_RELOAD" NUMBER(1,0), 
	"DESCRIPTION" NVARCHAR2(1000), 
	"TEXT_VALUE" NVARCHAR2(200), 
	"TEXT_DEFAULT_VALUE" NVARCHAR2(200), 
	"LONG_TEXT_VALUE" NCLOB, 
	"LONG_TEXT_DEFAULT_VALUE" NCLOB, 
	"BOOLEAN_VALUE" NUMBER(1,0), 
	"BOOLEAN_DEFAULT_VALUE" NUMBER(1,0), 
	"INTEGER_VALUE" NUMBER(14,0), 
	"INTEGER_DEFAULT_VALUE" NUMBER(14,0), 
	"FLOAT_VALUE" NUMBER(38,12), 
	"FLOAT_DEFAULT_VALUE" NUMBER(38,12), 
	"DATE_VALUE" DATE, 
	"DATE_DEFAULT_VALUE" DATE, 
	"FEATURE_TYPE" NUMBER(9,0) DEFAULT 1
   ) SEGMENT CREATION IMMEDIATE 
  PCTFREE 10 PCTUSED 40 INITRANS 1 MAXTRANS 255 
 NOCOMPRESS LOGGING
  STORAGE(INITIAL 65536 NEXT 1048576 MINEXTENTS 1 MAXEXTENTS 2147483645
  PCTINCREASE 0 FREELISTS 1 FREELIST GROUPS 1
  BUFFER_POOL DEFAULT FLASH_CACHE DEFAULT CELL_FLASH_CACHE DEFAULT)
  TABLESPACE "ESPDATA" 
 LOB ("LONG_TEXT_VALUE") STORE AS SECUREFILE (
  TABLESPACE "ESPDATA" ENABLE STORAGE IN ROW CHUNK 8192
  NOCACHE LOGGING  NOCOMPRESS  KEEP_DUPLICATES 
  STORAGE(INITIAL 106496 NEXT 1048576 MINEXTENTS 1 MAXEXTENTS 2147483645
  PCTINCREASE 0
  BUFFER_POOL DEFAULT FLASH_CACHE DEFAULT CELL_FLASH_CACHE DEFAULT)) 
 LOB ("LONG_TEXT_DEFAULT_VALUE") STORE AS SECUREFILE (
  TABLESPACE "ESPDATA" ENABLE STORAGE IN ROW CHUNK 8192
  NOCACHE LOGGING  NOCOMPRESS  KEEP_DUPLICATES 
  STORAGE(INITIAL 106496 NEXT 1048576 MINEXTENTS 1 MAXEXTENTS 2147483645
  PCTINCREASE 0
  BUFFER_POOL DEFAULT FLASH_CACHE DEFAULT CELL_FLASH_CACHE DEFAULT)) ;

   COMMENT ON COLUMN "BASE_CL25_2"."PARAMETER"."PARAMETER_ID" IS 'Primary key of the table.';
   COMMENT ON COLUMN "BASE_CL25_2"."PARAMETER"."CODE" IS 'Natural key of the table, i.e. should be unique.';
   COMMENT ON COLUMN "BASE_CL25_2"."PARAMETER"."TYPE" IS 'From the ParameterSettingTypes enumeration. Indicates the type of a parameter that the row is corresponding to. Exactly one type of a value (value or default value) will be specified and the others will be null.';
   COMMENT ON COLUMN "BASE_CL25_2"."PARAMETER"."IS_SKIPPED_BY_STARTUP_RELOAD" IS 'Is this parameter neither updated nor deleted when parameter settings are reloaded on application startup?';
   COMMENT ON TABLE "BASE_CL25_2"."PARAMETER"  IS 'This table is an alternative to using ''config'' parameters in an XML/config-file. These are really just name-value pairs. There is currently no plan to include a UI to view/edit these values, beyond various SQL clients (e.g. Toad, sqlDeveloper, sqlplus), much like values in the config-files. It is expected that these values are set when we configure a system for a customer.';

--  DDL for Table RESOURCE_CODE

  CREATE TABLE "BASE_CL25_2"."RESOURCE_CODE" 
   (	"RESOURCE_CODE_ID" NUMBER(14,0), 
	"NAME" NVARCHAR2(200), 
	"CODE" NVARCHAR2(100), 
	"TYPE_ID" NUMBER(14,0), 
	"IS_UNCOSTED" NUMBER(1,0), 
	"IS_UNIT_PRESERVING" NUMBER(1,0), 
	"UNIT_ID" NUMBER(14,0), 
	"HIDDEN_ENTITY" NUMBER(1,0), 
	"DATE_DELETED" TIMESTAMP (3) WITH TIME ZONE, 
	"HIERARCHY_LEVEL" NUMBER(9,0), 
	"HIERARCHY_PATH" NVARCHAR2(256), 
	"VERSION" NUMBER(9,0), 
	"DESCRIPTION" NVARCHAR2(1000), 
	"CURRENCY_AND_UNITS_CONVERSION" NUMBER GENERATED ALWAYS AS (CASE  WHEN ("IS_UNCOSTED"=0 AND "IS_UNIT_PRESERVING"=1) THEN 1 WHEN ("IS_UNCOSTED"=0 AND "IS_UNIT_PRESERVING"=0) THEN 2 WHEN ("IS_UNCOSTED"=1 AND "IS_UNIT_PRESERVING"=1) THEN 3 WHEN ("IS_UNCOSTED"=1 AND "IS_UNIT_PRESERVING"=0) THEN 4 END) VIRTUAL 
   ) SEGMENT CREATION IMMEDIATE 
  PCTFREE 10 PCTUSED 40 INITRANS 1 MAXTRANS 255 
 NOCOMPRESS LOGGING
  STORAGE(INITIAL 65536 NEXT 1048576 MINEXTENTS 1 MAXEXTENTS 2147483645
  PCTINCREASE 0 FREELISTS 1 FREELIST GROUPS 1
  BUFFER_POOL DEFAULT FLASH_CACHE DEFAULT CELL_FLASH_CACHE DEFAULT)
  TABLESPACE "ESPDATA" ;

   COMMENT ON COLUMN "BASE_CL25_2"."RESOURCE_CODE"."IS_UNCOSTED" IS 'If true, forecast distributions linked to this resource cannot have spend, they can have only unit amounts.';
   COMMENT ON COLUMN "BASE_CL25_2"."RESOURCE_CODE"."IS_UNIT_PRESERVING" IS 'Do benefits and forecast distributions linked to this resource preserve their unit amounts when shifted in time?';
   COMMENT ON COLUMN "BASE_CL25_2"."RESOURCE_CODE"."CURRENCY_AND_UNITS_CONVERSION" IS 'Virtual column derived from IS_UNCOSTED and IS_UNIT_PRESERVING.
    Four possible values represented by CL.BusinessInterfaces.Data.ResourceCurrencyAndUnitsConversion.
    1 = AllowPreserveUnits, 2 = AllowPreserveCurrency, 3 = DoNotAllowEnterInUnits, 4 = DoNotAllowEnterInCurrency';
   COMMENT ON TABLE "BASE_CL25_2"."RESOURCE_CODE"  IS 'May need to merge this table with resources';

from them when no longer applicable (e.g. if the asset/expenditure is removed from the risk).';

--  DDL for Table TEMPORARY_ID

  CREATE GLOBAL TEMPORARY TABLE "BASE_CL25_2"."TEMPORARY_ID" 
   (	"ID" NUMBER(14,0), 
	"DISCRIMINATOR" NUMBER(9,0), 
	"SEQ" NUMBER(14,0) GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY MINVALUE 1 MAXVALUE 99999999999999 INCREMENT BY 1 START WITH 1 CACHE 1000 ORDER  CYCLE  NOKEEP  NOSCALE 
   ) ON COMMIT DELETE ROWS ;

   COMMENT ON COLUMN "BASE_CL25_2"."TEMPORARY_ID"."DISCRIMINATOR" IS 'An optional (i.e. nullable) property. This can be used when there is potentially more than one collection of IDs that are stored in the table at one time (within one transaction), and each collection will have some unique discriminator to distinguish the IDs belonging to it. There is an index on this column since it is likely that when used, sub-queries will use a ''WHERE DISCRIMINATOR='' to get one collection.';
   COMMENT ON COLUMN "BASE_CL25_2"."TEMPORARY_ID"."SEQ" IS 'An auto-generated primary key used for tracking order of insertion. For now, use a global sequence for the identity for convenience. If performance is an issue, switch to a session sequence with manual management.';
   COMMENT ON TABLE "BASE_CL25_2"."TEMPORARY_ID"  IS 'Contains zero, or more ids. Typically populated with ids of entities of interest, then joined with another table in a query. Emptied when each transaction ends.';

   COMMENT ON COLUMN "BASE_CL25_2"."TEMPORARY_TRANSACTION_CONTEXT"."IS_FORCE_DELETE" IS 'Non-zero in some operations that need to have a trigger avoid its usual action of preventing a deletion.';
   COMMENT ON COLUMN "BASE_CL25_2"."TEMPORARY_TRANSACTION_CONTEXT"."SKIP_EXPNDITURE_DIVISION_CHECK" IS 'If non-zero, don''t verify that child and parent expenditures belong to the same division.';

--  DDL for Table TIME_SERIES
--------------------------------------------------------

  CREATE TABLE "BASE_CL25_2"."TIME_SERIES" 
   (	"TIME_SERIES_ID" NUMBER(14,0), 
	"CODE" NVARCHAR2(100), 
	"NAME" NVARCHAR2(100), 
	"VERSION" NUMBER(9,0), 
	"SERIES_TYPE" NUMBER(9,0), 
	"IS_DEFAULT" NUMBER(1,0), 
	"OFFSET_TYPE" NUMBER(9,0), 
	"VALUES_ARRAY_ENCODING" NUMBER(9,0), 
	"CREATOR_ID" NUMBER(14,0), 
	"CREATED_DATE" TIMESTAMP (3) WITH TIME ZONE, 
	"UPDATER_ID" NUMBER(14,0), 
	"UPDATED_DATE" TIMESTAMP (3) WITH TIME ZONE, 
	"CUSTOM_SERIES_TYPE_ID" NUMBER(14,0), 
	"UNIT_ID" NUMBER(14,0), 
	"RESOURCE_CODE_ID" NUMBER(14,0), 
	"BASE_YEAR" NUMBER(9,0), 
	"BASE_MONTH" NUMBER(9,0), 
	"UNINFLATED_REF_FISCAL_YEAR" NUMBER(9,0), 
	"VALUES_ARRAY" BLOB, 
	"NAME_NLS" RAW(1610) GENERATED ALWAYS AS (NLSSORT("NAME",'nls_sort=''GENERIC_BASELETTER''')) VIRTUAL , 
	"LOADING_ID" NUMBER(14,0), 
	"SOURCE_CURRENCY_UNIT_ID" NUMBER(14,0), 
	"TARGET_CURRENCY_UNIT_ID" NUMBER(14,0), 
	"EXCH_RATE_LEAST_CURRENCY_ID_GEN" NUMBER INVISIBLE GENERATED ALWAYS AS (LEAST("SOURCE_CURRENCY_UNIT_ID","TARGET_CURRENCY_UNIT_ID")) VIRTUAL , 
	"EXCH_RATE_GREATEST_CURRENCY_ID_GEN" NUMBER INVISIBLE GENERATED ALWAYS AS (GREATEST("SOURCE_CURRENCY_UNIT_ID","TARGET_CURRENCY_UNIT_ID")) VIRTUAL , 
	"IS_DEFAULT_GEN" NUMBER INVISIBLE GENERATED ALWAYS AS (CASE "IS_DEFAULT" WHEN 1 THEN 0 ELSE "TIME_SERIES_ID" END) VIRTUAL , 
	"YEARLY_WITH_MONTHLY_COMPOUND" NUMBER(1,0)
   ) SEGMENT CREATION IMMEDIATE 
  PCTFREE 10 PCTUSED 40 INITRANS 1 MAXTRANS 255 
 NOCOMPRESS LOGGING
  STORAGE(INITIAL 65536 NEXT 1048576 MINEXTENTS 1 MAXEXTENTS 2147483645
  PCTINCREASE 0 FREELISTS 1 FREELIST GROUPS 1
  BUFFER_POOL DEFAULT FLASH_CACHE DEFAULT CELL_FLASH_CACHE DEFAULT)
  TABLESPACE "ESPDATA" 
 LOB ("VALUES_ARRAY") STORE AS SECUREFILE (
  TABLESPACE "ESPDATA" ENABLE STORAGE IN ROW CHUNK 8192
  NOCACHE LOGGING  NOCOMPRESS  KEEP_DUPLICATES 
  STORAGE(INITIAL 106496 NEXT 1048576 MINEXTENTS 1 MAXEXTENTS 2147483645
  PCTINCREASE 0
  BUFFER_POOL DEFAULT FLASH_CACHE DEFAULT CELL_FLASH_CACHE DEFAULT)) ;

   COMMENT ON COLUMN "BASE_CL25_2"."TIME_SERIES"."SERIES_TYPE" IS 'The type of time series: \
inflation rate, \
loading rate, \
discount rate, \
custom rate, \
custom field value, \
resource, \
exchange rate.';
   COMMENT ON COLUMN "BASE_CL25_2"."TIME_SERIES"."IS_DEFAULT" IS 'Allows a system default stream to be defined for inflation and discount rates.';
   COMMENT ON COLUMN "BASE_CL25_2"."TIME_SERIES"."OFFSET_TYPE" IS 'Determines the type of alignment for the stream values: \
absolute calendar yearly - values are for individual years offset from the base calendar year of the time series, \
absolute calendar monthly - values are for individual months offset from the base calendar year and month of the time series, \
absolute fiscal yearly - values are for individual years offset from the base fiscal year of the time series, \
relative yearly - values are for individual years offset from some year defined externally to the time series, \
relative monthly - values are for individual months offset from some year and month defined externally to the time series.';
   COMMENT ON COLUMN "BASE_CL25_2"."TIME_SERIES"."VALUES_ARRAY_ENCODING" IS 'Describes how the binary stream is encoded: raw (no encoding), gzip. \
This allows streams with many repeated values to be compressed if desired.';
   COMMENT ON COLUMN "BASE_CL25_2"."TIME_SERIES"."CUSTOM_SERIES_TYPE_ID" IS 'The type of a custom rate time series. \
The types are customer-specific application codes, similar to other customer-specific type lists such as activity types. \
This is used to group the custom rates in the UI and to filter the rates for selection when desired. \
It would be possible to add a similar column to group custom field time series values, if required in the future.';
   COMMENT ON COLUMN "BASE_CL25_2"."TIME_SERIES"."RESOURCE_CODE_ID" IS 'Non-null if this is a time series for a resource.';
   COMMENT ON COLUMN "BASE_CL25_2"."TIME_SERIES"."BASE_YEAR" IS 'Defines the starting year for a stream of values with an absolute offset.';
   COMMENT ON COLUMN "BASE_CL25_2"."TIME_SERIES"."BASE_MONTH" IS 'Defines the starting month for a stream of values with an absolute monthly offset.';
   COMMENT ON COLUMN "BASE_CL25_2"."TIME_SERIES"."VALUES_ARRAY" IS 'A binary stream of doubles representing consecutive numeric values of length VALUES_ARRAY_LENGTH. \
Values before the start of the sequence are assumed to be 0. \
Values after the end of the sequence are assumed to be an infinite repetition of the last value in the array. \
A constant value can be represented with a single numeric value with a base year/month of the system''s first fiscal year.';
   COMMENT ON COLUMN "BASE_CL25_2"."TIME_SERIES"."NAME_NLS" IS 'Virtual column NLSSORT';
   COMMENT ON COLUMN "BASE_CL25_2"."TIME_SERIES"."SOURCE_CURRENCY_UNIT_ID" IS 'Defines for an exchange rate, the source currency from which a value is converted. References a currency-type unit.';
   COMMENT ON COLUMN "BASE_CL25_2"."TIME_SERIES"."TARGET_CURRENCY_UNIT_ID" IS 'Defines for an exchange rate, the target currency to which a value is converted. References a currency-type unit.';
   COMMENT ON COLUMN "BASE_CL25_2"."TIME_SERIES"."EXCH_RATE_LEAST_CURRENCY_ID_GEN" IS 'Virtual column used to enforce uniqueness on an unordered pair of currency units for an exchange rate. Achieves the unordered pair by normalizing to the smaller unit id of the currency pair.';
   COMMENT ON COLUMN "BASE_CL25_2"."TIME_SERIES"."EXCH_RATE_GREATEST_CURRENCY_ID_GEN" IS 'Virtual column used to enforce uniqueness on an unordered pair of currency units for an exchange rate. Achieves the unordered pair by normalizing the larger unit id of the currency pair.';
   COMMENT ON COLUMN "BASE_CL25_2"."TIME_SERIES"."IS_DEFAULT_GEN" IS 'Virtual column used to enforce a single is_default rate for a series type.';
   COMMENT ON COLUMN "BASE_CL25_2"."TIME_SERIES"."YEARLY_WITH_MONTHLY_COMPOUND" IS 'Indicates that the inflation rate is defined with fiscal yearly offsets but compounds monthly';
   COMMENT ON TABLE "BASE_CL25_2"."TIME_SERIES"  IS 'A time series holds a time-ordered stream of numeric values.';

References a currency-type unit. This is always the smaller unit id so unordered currency pairs can be easily grouped and processed.';
   COMMENT ON COLUMN "BASE_CL25_2"."TIME_SERIES_DEFAULT_CHK"."GREATEST_CURRENCY_UNIT_ID" IS 'Defines for an exchange rate, between the source and target currencies for a currency pair, the currency with the larger unit id.    (	"WORKFLOW_ID" NUMBER(14,0),

	"DESCRIPTION" NVARCHAR2(200), 
	"NOTIFICATION_REQUIRED" NUMBER(1,0),

--------------------------------------------------------
--  DDL for Materialized View MV_ENTITY_TYPES_HIERARCHY
--------------------------------------------------------

  CREATE MATERIALIZED VIEW "BASE_CL25_2"."MV_ENTITY_TYPES_HIERARCHY" ("TABLE_NAME", "LVL")
  SEGMENT CREATION IMMEDIATE
  ORGANIZATION HEAP PCTFREE 10 PCTUSED 40 INITRANS 1 MAXTRANS 255 
 NOCOMPRESS NOLOGGING
  STORAGE(INITIAL 65536 NEXT 1048576 MINEXTENTS 1 MAXEXTENTS 2147483645
  PCTINCREASE 0 FREELISTS 1 FREELIST GROUPS 1
  BUFFER_POOL DEFAULT FLASH_CACHE DEFAULT CELL_FLASH_CACHE DEFAULT)
  TABLESPACE "ESPDATA" 
   CACHE 
  BUILD IMMEDIATE
  USING INDEX 
  REFRESH FORCE ON DEMAND
  USING DEFAULT LOCAL ROLLBACK SEGMENT
  USING ENFORCED CONSTRAINTS DISABLE ON QUERY COMPUTATION DISABLE QUERY REWRITE
  AS with hier as (
    select distinct parent, child, level as lvl, connect_by_isleaf is_leaf from (
    select parent_table.table_name parent, child_table.table_name child
     from user_tables      parent_table,
          user_constraints parent_constraint,
          user_constraints child_constraint,
          user_tables      child_table
    where parent_table.table_name = parent_constraint.table_name
      and parent_constraint.constraint_type IN( 'P', 'U' )
      and child_constraint.r_constraint_name = parent_constraint.constraint_name
      and child_constraint.constraint_type   = 'R'
      and child_table.table_name = child_constraint.table_name
      and child_table.table_name != parent_table.table_name
    )
    connect by nocycle prior child = parent
)
select
    table_name,
    lvl * 2 + is_leaf as lvl -- A tie-breaker when a leaf node is detected.
from (
    select parent as table_name, 0 as is_leaf, max(lvl) as lvl
    from hier
    group by parent
    union all
    select child, is_leaf, max(lvl)
    from hier a
    where is_leaf = 1 and not exists (select null from hier b where b.parent = a.child)
    group by child, is_leaf
);

   COMMENT ON MATERIALIZED VIEW "BASE_CL25_2"."MV_ENTITY_TYPES_HIERARCHY"  IS 'snapshot table for snapshot BASE_CL25_2.MV_ENTITY_TYPES_HIERARCHY';
--------------------------------------------------------
--  Constraints for Table DDF_CONDITIONAL_DEPENDENCY
--------------------------------------------------------

  ALTER TABLE "BASE_CL25_2"."DDF_CONDITIONAL_DEPENDENCY" MODIFY ("DDF_CONDITIONAL_DEPENDENCY_ID" NOT NULL ENABLE);
  ALTER TABLE "BASE_CL25_2"."DDF_CONDITIONAL_DEPENDENCY" MODIFY ("DDF_FIELD_DEPENDENCY_ID" NOT NULL ENABLE);
  ALTER TABLE "BASE_CL25_2"."DDF_CONDITIONAL_DEPENDENCY" MODIFY ("PARENT_FIELD_CODE" NOT NULL ENABLE);
  ALTER TABLE "BASE_CL25_2"."DDF_CONDITIONAL_DEPENDENCY" MODIFY ("VERSION" NOT NULL ENABLE);
  ALTER TABLE "BASE_CL25_2"."DDF_CONDITIONAL_DEPENDENCY" MODIFY ("PARENT_FIELD_ENTITY_TYPE" NOT NULL ENABLE);
  ALTER TABLE "BASE_CL25_2"."DDF_CONDITIONAL_DEPENDENCY" ADD CONSTRAINT "DDF_CONDITIONAL_DEPENDENCY_PARENT_FIELD_ENTITY_TYPE_VALID" CHECK ( PARENT_FIELD_ENTITY_TYPE BETWEEN 1 AND 21 ) ENABLE;
  ALTER TABLE "BASE_CL25_2"."DDF_CONDITIONAL_DEPENDENCY" ADD CONSTRAINT "VERSION_POS_1982505195" CHECK (Version > 0) ENABLE;
  ALTER TABLE "BASE_CL25_2"."DDF_CONDITIONAL_DEPENDENCY" ADD CONSTRAINT "DDF_CONDITIONAL_DEPENDENCY_PK" PRIMARY KEY ("DDF_CONDITIONAL_DEPENDENCY_ID")

             UPPER_INTERP_MULTIPLIER IS NULL) OR

             LOWER_INTERP_MULTIPLIER <= 1 AND

        AND TARGET_MILESTONE1_ID IS NOT NULL)

    )
    OR

        AND TARGET_MILESTONE1_ID IS NULL)

            (

            )
        )
        AND
        (
            DS_SOURCE_MILESTONE2_ID IS NULL
